languages.text: {n}Кибермастиф издает звук, похожий на смесь скулежа и скрежета по металлу. Что-то подсказывает вам, что сервопротоколы зафиксировали каждое ваше слово.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибермастиф издает звук, похожий на смесь скулежа и скрежета по металлу. Что-то подсказывает вам, что сервопротоколы зафиксировали каждое ваше слово.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of both a dog's whimper and the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of both a dog's whimper and the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of both a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of both a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、犬の鳴き声に金属の軋む音が混ざったような音を発した。{petname}のサーボプロトコルがあなたの言葉ひとつひとつを確実に記録したと確信した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、犬の鳴き声に金属の軋む音が混ざったような音を発した。{petname}のサーボプロトコルがあなたの言葉ひとつひとつを確実に記録したと確信した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff macht ein Geräusch, das dich an das Winseln eines Hundes erinnert, kombiniert mit dem Kreischen von Metall. Du bist zuversichtlich, dass die Servoprotokolle von {petname} jedes deiner Wort registriert haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff macht ein Geräusch, das dich an das Winseln eines Hundes erinnert, kombiniert mit dem Kreischen von Metall. Du bist zuversichtlich, dass die Servoprotokolle von {petname} jedes deiner Wort registriert haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cyber-mastiff émet un son à mi-chemin entre le gémissement canin et le grincement de deux pièces de métal qui s'entrechoquent. Vous sentez que les servo-protocoles de {petname} ont parfaitement enregistré la moindre de vos paroles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cyber-mastiff émet un son à mi-chemin entre le gémissement canin et le grincement de deux pièces de métal qui s'entrechoquent. Vous sentez que les servo-protocoles de {petname} ont parfaitement enregistré la moindre de vos paroles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} emite un sonido que te recuerda al gañido de un perro mezclado con un chirrido metálico. Tienes la certeza de que sus servoprotocolos han captado todas tus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} emite un sonido que te recuerda al gañido de un perro mezclado con un chirrido metálico. Tienes la certeza de que sus servoprotocolos han captado todas tus palabras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}生化獒犬发出的声音，仿佛真正的狗发出的呜咽声，其间夹杂着金属的咯吱声。你很确信，{petname}的伺服协议忠实地记录了你说出的每个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff makes a sound that reminds you of a dog's whimper combined with the screeching of metal. You feel confident that {petname}'s servo-protocols have registered your every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生化獒犬发出的声音，仿佛真正的狗发出的呜咽声，其间夹杂着金属的咯吱声。你很确信，{petname}的伺服协议忠实地记录了你说出的每个字。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastif, köpek iniltisiyle karışık metal çınlamasını andıran bir ses çıkarıyor. Köpeğin hizmoprotokollerinin, ağzından çıkan her kelimeyi kaydettiğini anlıyorsun.{/n}
